titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 59) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes, and waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-239, by Mr. Sessions.

The resolution provides for a motion offered by the chair of the Committee on Appropriations or his designee that the House recede from its amendments and concur in the Senate amendment with an amendment printed in House Report 113-239.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 62.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 367.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 198 (Roll no. 501).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 204 (Roll no. 502).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/30/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 59) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes, and waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
